posts.post_content:
Obvious edge wear but crease free and a clean image, which is much harder to find on these than you might think. Price is net to me by Paypal and delivered. PM if interested. Thanks!

I also have a [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?p=1890278#post1890278"]1922 W575-2 Babe Ruth and Ty Cobb[/URL] for sale and would be willing to offer a reduced price on multiple purchases and an even greater reduced price on all three.

T213 Ty Cobb SGC 10 $ 
1922 W575-2 Ty Cobb PSA 1 $SOLD


Arthur

Prices reduced. At some point soon I'm just going to cross the Cobb to PSA and jack the price up.

Arthur
Beautiful card Arthur, if I had the extra cash I would be all over it.

This is my last round of price reductions. Gonna give this a few days and then the Cobb is off to PSA to cross to a 1 and then I'm jacking the price up to meet VCP. The Ruth will just go back into my collection.

Thanks to everyone that has showed interest!

Arthur
